thread.title: Karisma Kapoor and Sandeep Toshniwal’s date night with Saif-Kareena, Ranbir Kapoor, Ayan Mukerji and Sara Ali Khan
thread.title_full: Karisma Kapoor and Sandeep Toshniwal’s date night with Saif-Kareena, Ranbir Kapoor, Ayan Mukerji and Sara Ali Khan | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Karisma Kapoor and Sandeep Toshniwal’s date night with Saif-Kareena, Ranbir Kapoor, Ayan Mukerji and Sara Ali Khan
text:
The Kapoor clan seems to be bonding big time with Karisma Kapoor 's rumoured boyfriend Sandeep Toshniwal . First Sandeep was spotted attending Randhir Kapoor's 70th birthday celebrations, a few days back and more recently he was spotted with the Kapoor sisters, Ranbir Kapoor , Saif Ali Khan and his daughter Sara Ali Khan. The gang was reportedly snapped outside Prithvi Theatre. 

The shutterbugs went into a frenzy on spotting Karisma in the same car with her alleged beau. 

Bebo who was dressed casually came in with hubby Saif Ali Khan. Saif's daughter Sara, who's making headlines with the reports of her Bollywood debut, also joined in. 






Ranbir Kapoor, who is gearing up to step into the shoes of Sanjay Dutt in the Dutt biopic was present along with close friend Ayan Mukerji. The two of them are currently working together on a film that also stars Alia Bhatt .
